thread.title: This Halo Top Pie Will Make You Wish Every Day Was Your Birthday
thread.title_full: This Halo Top Pie Will Make You Wish Every Day Was Your Birthday

author: Hedy Phillips
title: This Halo Top Pie Will Make You Wish Every Day Was Your Birthday
text:
Halo Top Birthday Pie Recipe This Halo Top Pie Will Make You Wish Every Day Was Your Birthday   Hedy Phillips 28 Shares 
Halo Top ice cream might be my new favorite thing. It's low in calories but not low on flavor. I can honestly eat an entire pint and not feel bad about it, so when Halo Top shared this recipe for a birthday pie using the Birthday Cake flavor, I suddenly wished it was my birthday so I'd have an excuse to make it. I didn't let something like a silly calendar keep me from whipping this supereasy recipe together, though, and you shouldn't either. It only requires a few ingredients, and you can eat a slice without wanting to fall asleep, a feeling that a huge honkin' piece of chocolate cake might bring. Related:
